name: Betsy's Revenge
description:
A silly game I made in 1 week about a cow getting some revenge on some farmers. Use your headbutt attack and your milk machine gun to defeat 10 waves of farmers, while upgrading your stats with the hats you pick up from defeated farmers.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move around
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Left Mouse Button - Headbutt
  • Hold Right Mouse Button - Fire milk machine gun
  • ESC - Uncapture mouse, press twice to pause the game
